status.description: Overall status indicating if the compatibility check succeeded.

provisioning_status.description: Status indicating if the provisioning is supported.

usecase_status.description: Status indicating if the usecase is supported.

license_supported_status.description: Status indicating if the licenses are supported.

usecase.description: Usecase for the compatibility check, e.g. library (as in using the inbound licensed component as a library)

provisioning.description: The way the component is provided to the user for the compatibility check, e.g. binary-distribution

modification.description: Has the component been modified. Currently not used/implemented.

compatibility_status.description: The compatbility between the Outbound and Inbound license expressions

anyOf.description: A list of texts describing the compatiblity, e.g. how the compatibility was determined

api_version.description: The api version of the program providing the reply

resource_name.description: The name of the program providing the reply, e.g. licomp-osadl

resource_version.description: The versions of the program providing the reply, e.g. licomp-osadl

resource_disclaimer.description: A disclaimer of the program providing the reply.

data_url.description: A URL pointing to the data used to provide the resulting compatibility.

resource_url.description: A URL pointing to the project page (or similar) for the program providing the resulting compatibility.
